name: Magic Toothbus
description: Magic ToothBus is composed of dental advocates who are passionate about helping children in low-income communities obtain access and resources to dental care. Magic ToothBus brings preventative care directly into schools with high rates of children from disadvantaged socio-economic status who can receive dental care. Programs include: - Preventative Care for Children - School-based Sealant Care - Dental Services for Pregnant Women - Dental Services for Seniors - Oral Health Education - Train the
